title: Enable WinAppDriver for Xbox and Mobile
body: Right now WinAppDriver only works on desktop.

comments.body:
Pretty old request, however, for UWP apps (native, HTML) on Xbox One you can use Suitest.
https://suite.st/
I'm willing to spend my team's resources for refactoring the WinAppDriver for xBox. Whom can we talk @Microsoft about third-party contributions into the WinAppDriver?

This is long overdue! MLB releases dozens of apps for the UWP xBox and mobile, but no functional test automation solutions available for CI/CD :( Is there any way to open source the WinAppDriver, so community can re-write it for UWP xBox and mobile apps?
